titleStmt.title: The true Protestants prayer or the godly mans supplication unto Almihgty [sic] God, for the afflicted Church in Ireland. Composed by that learned and religious divine, Francis Cook Batchelor in Divinity, and preacher at Yoxall in Stafford-shire. Humbly desiring all godly Christians, for the Lord Christs sake, to joyne with him in prayer for the afflicted brethren.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Francis, d. 1682.

titleStmt.title: The true Protestants prayer or the godly mans supplication unto Almihgty [sic] God, for the afflicted Church in Ireland. notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
